question: I have polycystic kydney disease, htn, diabetes, and a significant family history of stroke and heart attack.  I am 41 year old female. I have chest pain, shortness of breath,left arm pain, teeth and jaw pain, difficulty falling asleep and heart palpitations. I have had stress test, echo, ekg, blood work, and halter monitor.Dr said I was fine. I still feel like something serious is wrong but no one takes me seriously. Should I still be searching for answers?  Is it possible I could still be cardiac related even though these test were normal?
title: frustrated and worried
